noaa.name: NOAA Digital Coast - Vessel Traffic Data
noaa.description: Vessel location and characteristic data from USCG AIS system
noaa.coverage_area: Coastal areas of contiguous U.S., Alaska, Hawaii, territories
noaa.usage_notes: Use AccessAIS tool for interactive download by geography and time period

uscg_nvmc.name: US Coast Guard National Vessel Movement Center
uscg_nvmc.description: Notice of Arrival and Departure (NOAD) data for vessels entering U.S. ports
uscg_nvmc.authentication: May require registration for data access
uscg_nvmc.usage_notes: Primary clearinghouse for vessel arrival/departure information

uscg_vivs.name: US Coast Guard Vessel Information Verification Service
uscg_vivs.description: AIS static data including MMSI, call sign, vessel name, dimensions
uscg_vivs.usage_notes: Retrieve vessel broadcasted AIS static data

uscg_ais.name: US Coast Guard AIS Data Sharing
uscg_ais.description: AIS vessel tracking data at different access levels

level_b.access: Government agencies, validated port partners, certain NGOs
level_b.requirements: Data Feed Request Form and Interconnection Security Agreement

uscg_ais.usage_notes: Real-time feeds require ISA with Coast Guard

marad.name: Maritime Administration (MARAD)
marad.description: U.S. flag fleet data, port statistics, and maritime transportation statistics
marad.usage_notes: Comprehensive maritime transportation statistics and fleet data

data_gov.name: Data.gov Maritime Datasets
data_gov.description: Federal maritime shipping datasets including vessel schedules and AIS data

virginia_port_schedules.name: Virginia International Gateway Vessel Schedules
virginia_port_schedules.description: Vessel schedule information for ships berthing at Virginia ports

port_grain_activity.name: Port Region Grain Ocean Vessel Activity
port_grain_activity.description: Weekly data on ocean vessels in port regions

ais_vessel_tracks.name: AIS Vessel Tracks
ais_vessel_tracks.description: Location and characteristic sequences for commercial and recreational vessels

data_gov.usage_notes: Use CKAN API for programmatic access to dataset metadata

notes: NOAA AccessAIS provides interactive download tool for vessel traffic data
USCG AIS data requires proper authentication for real-time feeds
MARAD provides comprehensive U.S. flag fleet and port statistics
Data.gov CKAN API enables programmatic dataset discovery
All coordinates should use WGS84 (EPSG:4326) for consistency
